t: Fairway Market - Wikipedia
s: 3 weeks ago - Fairway Market is an American grocery chain founded in 1933 by Nathan Glickberg. The brand is owned by the Wakefern Food Corporation, whose flagship supermarket cooperative network is ShopRite.

t: East Coast’s First Amazon Fresh Supermarket Planned For Shuttered Fairway Location | Jersey Digs
s: November 27, 2020 - After filing bankruptcy earlier this year, Fairway Market closed their Woodland Park location. Image via Google Maps/Street View. The 59,350-square foot space is located within the Plaza 46 development, which intersects Browertown Road and currently hosts other major retailers including Kohl’s. The sprawling storefront will soon be home to a new concept called Amazon Fresh, a subsidiary brand ...

s: January 10, 2025 - Long Island Business News, both spaces were leased some two years ago but remained vacant while Amazon put a hold on expansion plans. The Plainview store was formerly home to Fairway Market, and the East Setauket store was formerly a Waldbaum’s.

s: March 20, 2020 - AMAZON CONFIRMS FIRST CORONAVIRUS CASE AT US WAREHOUSE · The Seattle company is reportedly not interested in buying the entire Fairway chain or its brand name.

t: Amazon is Looking To Purchase Four Fairway Stores
s: March 23, 2020 - The company did not bid on the other ten Fairway locations that were on the auction block. A source close to the auction told the Post that it is very likely that Amazon will win the four stores. What the company will do with the stores — turn them into distribution centers, convert them to Whole Foods locations, or establish new locations of the Amazon Go brand ...
